{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CNet |model=CQR-981 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/02/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=E-TOP |manuf_model=BR081n |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U6A-BR081N |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C;RTL8196C, A5P02A1, GA23 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EM2I-10G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE;RTL8188RE, A4L38S1 GA20; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=portable,3G capable,WiMAX capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CQR-981_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^CQR-981_[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:08:A1 |oui_eth=00:08:A1 }} ''Wireless-N Pico 3.5G Broadband Router''
There may be multple revisions of this device. There is no FCC ID printed on the label. The FCC ID of the parent model has been assigned to the device. "EPMBBR081NXXX2XX" is silkscreened on the board. "BR081N 2B (NB-V1002)", "H100909702" is printed on a label stuck to the unit. The power adapter included with the device is a '''Keen Ocean Industrial''' S01-005-0050-01000 SWP-80189-00 (5V, 1A). ==Images== File:CNet CQR-981 angled.jpg|angled shot File:CNet CQR-981 front.jpg|front File:CNet CQR-981 back.jpg|back File:CNet CQR-981 top.jpg|top File:CNet CQR-981 label.jpg|bottom and label [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:CNet CQR-981 board top.jpg|board top File:CNet CQR-981 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
